adHeader: Beginner Guitar Lessons $25-$45 w. free recording!
adDetails: Experienced Touring musician and Recording Engineer offering guitar lessons in studio. One on one lessons designed to advance beginning guitarists. And a free recording of our session to take home and track improvement and to follow along for home study Hyper Raje Studio 965 Mission Street San Francisco, CA 94103 Phone show contact info Open 7 days a week: Monday -- Sunday 11:00am -- 2:00am Hourly rate: ($25/half hr). Special rate: ($45/hr) Acoustic and Electric Guitar lessons Acoustically tuned/ Soundproofed/ Sound insulated room. Air-conditioned room. Easy load in and out. Free wireless high speed DSL Internet. Conveniently located near stores, restaurants, and shops. Located near Powell BART * We strictly enforce a 24 hour cancellation policy.
